## ControlParams interface

These are optional params to supply detailed config for controls that allow it. This could potentially support a wide range of options, but if so should be more strongly typed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ControlParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [max?](./components.controlparams.max.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Max numeric range, e.g., for slider or spinner |
|  [min?](./components.controlparams.min.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Min numeric range, e.g., for slider or spinner |
|  [options?](./components.controlparams.options.md) |  | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> List of selectable options, e.g., for dropdown or radio. |
|  [step?](./components.controlparams.step.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Numeric step increment, e.g., for slider or spinner |
